name: @reliverse/remdn
description: @reliverse/remdn is a modern markdown automation CLI tool that helps you generate, update, and validate your Markdown files automatically. Designed with a code-first mindset and built on TypeScript, remdn keeps your README, docs, and various exports in sync with your project metadata, brand guidelines, and evolving content.

scripts.agg: relidler tools --tool agg --input src/libs/core/core-impl --out src/libs/core/core-main.ts --recursive --named --strip src/libs/core
